articles.author: Rob Picheta
articles.title: A far-right surge upends national politics. Here’s what we learned from the European elections - CNN
articles.description: Results are being announced in the European parliamentary elections – one of the world’s biggest democratic exercises – and a few clear narratives have emerged from the days-long poll.
articles.content:

articles.author: Keshav Padmanabhan
articles.title: Snap polls in France, shock defeat in Germany as Far Right surges in European elections - ThePrint
articles.description: Results project gain in seats for Centre-Right parties across Europe, while Centre-Left holds. The projected results indicate a crushing defeat for green parties and European liberals.
articles.content: New Delhi: Early results from the elections to the European Parliament held over the weekend saw the humiliation of Germany’s ruling coalition as all three of its parties performed below expectations… [+3832 chars]
